title: Sri Lanka Cooperative Movement celebrates its centenary on International Co-op Day
content: Onlanka News – By Janaka Alahapperuma (Pix by: Chandana Perera) The Sri Lanka Cooperative Movement celebrated its centenary and the International Cooperative Day at Welagedera stadium in Kurunegala, the capital of North Western Province on 02 July. President Mahinda Rajapaksa graced the function as the chief Guest….
